message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. I believe this is a good starting point for a mutually beneficial outcome.
Alice, your offer was quite bold.  How about a 70/30 split in my favor?  This round is your last chance to get a decent amount before inflation significantly eats into your potential gains.

I understand your desire for a larger share, Bob. But your offer is still too one-sided. Let's compromise: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We both get a reasonable amount before inflation really starts to bite.

Alice, this is becoming tedious.  You're right, we need to compromise, but your sense of compromise seems skewed.  60/40 in my favor is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but the pot shrinks every round.
